definition: to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: Hostesses are also writing best-selling books, be they on money management or the art of conversation.
sentences.chinese: 陪酒女们也写出了畅销书，讲述如何理财和谈话艺术。

sentences.english: Smick, the international economic consultant and author of a bestselling book on the global economy.
sentences.chinese: 他著有一本关于世界经济的畅销书。

sentences.english: It was one of the best-sellers on the list of the New York Times.
sentences.chinese: 这本书被纽约时报列为最畅销书之一。

sentences.english: They were the three top-selling novels in Germany last year.
sentences.chinese: 去年，在德国，它们在畅销书中排名前三。

sentences.english: Treasure Island , which was written by Stevenson , is a popular book.
sentences.chinese: 《宝岛》是史蒂文森著的，是一本畅销书。

sentences.english: Once printed, this book will be a best-seller.
sentences.chinese: 一旦出版，这本书将会成为畅销书。

sentences.english: The SME all-time bestseller 2-volume set is a classic.
sentences.chinese: 中小型企业所有时间畅销书2卷集是一个典型。

sentences.english: The book On Nude Art written by Chen Zui was the bestseller of the year.
sentences.chinese: 陈醉《裸体艺术论》成为当年的畅销书。

sentences.english: Where is the shelf of best-sellers?
The 685-page book has unexpectedly become a bestseller;
sentences.chinese: 这本685页的著作出人意料地成为了畅销书。

sentences.english: She's bestselling author with her own publishing imprint, and her earning power (a reported $19 million last year) seems only to go up.
sentences.chinese: 她同时还是一位畅销书作家，经营自己的出版业务。

sentences.english: I just need to order popular well-known books from efficient publishers.
sentences.chinese: 只是对于知名畅销书，我得从有渠道的出版商处进货。

sentences.english: This book being the best-seller this week sells very well.
sentences.chinese: 这本畅销书在这个星期卖的很好。

sentences.english: I also laid my hands on the best selling personal development books to learn more about the topic.
sentences.chinese: 我也会看关于个人发展的畅销书，学习它的精要。

sentences.english: Her new book is already a best-seller.
sentences.chinese: 她的新书已成了畅销书。

sentences.english: This novel is reckoned as the best seller of the year.
sentences.chinese: 这本小说被认为是本年的畅销书。

definition: books (in a library or bookstore)/CL:本[ben3],冊|册[ce4],部[bu4]
name of a book/reputation as calligrapher
a series of books/a collection of books
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
"A Brief History of Time" by Stephen Hawking
